# Demo Videos/GIFs

Place your demo media files here:

- `demo1.mp4` - Upload Documents demo
- `demo2.mp4` - Run Test Scenarios demo  
- `demo3.mp4` - Reports demo

You can also use GIF files:
- `demo1.gif` - Upload Documents demo
- `demo2.gif` - Run Test Scenarios demo
- `demo3.gif` - Reports demo

**Note:** Files in the `public` folder are served from the root URL, so `/demos/demo1.mp4` will work in your code.
